featured.text: They are shrinking in number because they make no profits.
28 already shrunk by 85% to a mere 0.5 square kilometers, Papua’s glaciers will completely disappear within a decade, researchers have predicted.
According to the analysis, the 22 between India’s southern and northern tips shrinks by 2 cm every year.

definition.zh_def: 縮小，變小或減少尺寸、數量或重要性。
definition.en_def: To become smaller in size, amount, or importance.
definition.example: The sweater will shrink if you wash it in hot water.
